climbs.name: Slammed Drunk
climbs.fa: Steve Sandmann, equipped by Dustin Stephens

content.description: Sustained bouldering to a no hands rest. Once ready, do a tricky mantel to gain the final headwall, grab some holds and jump!
Sustained liebacking and jamming up the left-facing corner just right of Burnout. Join Burnout at the last bolt when the dihedral crack becomes choked with plants.
content.protection: Hands and fingers, maybe one larger piece. 1 bolt, bolted anchor shared with Burnout
content.location: 10' right of Burnout in the obvious nice dihedral

content.description: Hard bouldery line between Slammed Drunk and Burnout. Maybe 13+ to 14- range?
content.location: Shorter wall right of the main cave. 25' left of the 5.11 warmup Burnout.

content.description:
Open project with fixed draws, bring a brush and have at it! Basically the top of Madness Cave into perfect Solar Collector rock to finish. Ignore the re

d tag if still there. Equipped by Dustin Stephens with help from John Flunker.
content.location: Furthest right of four lines (incomplete, incomplete, 13b, this project) in the main sector of the Mega Cave, 100' left of Slammed Drunk

content.description: Crag warmup, which unfortunately is a bit hard at the bottom and doesn't get morning sun. Still a worthy outing on good rock.
content.location: Right side of the crag on a smaller wall right of the main cave, look for a dihedral with orange rock about 100' right of Slammed Drunk and 25' right of hard bouldery open project.
